Begin BattleBot1Script

short fight

if ( MenuMode == 1 )
	Return
endif

if ( gethealth = 0 )
	return
endif

if ( ignatius_flaccus.FightStart == 1 )
	if ( fight == 0 )
	    	centurion_sphere_bbot1->StartCombat centurion_steam_bbot2
		set fight to 1
	endif
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex "MS_BattleBots2" >= 1 )
	StartCombat Player
endif

End
